attributes.action: Ban Physical Education In Secondary and Primary Schools In The U.K.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that physical education should be banned in schools across the U.K. I feel really strongly about this as when i was at school I was always bullied because of P.E. Also I feel that probably the majority of students in schools don't enjoy P.E. I think to keep sports in schools have lunchtime and afterschool clubs on.
